name: Penguin Climb
description:
Penguin Climb is a short arcade game where closing all the doors is the only way to get to the next level! Freeze foes in ice then smash the ice cubes to get a new high score! Controls: Arrow Keys/WASD - Move Control - Shoot Ice Game by:  Jacy Solomons (Art, Programming, Game Design) & Kostas Dokos (Programming)

Special thanks to Southampton Solent University
